Recepi
Apple Martini
Servings
VesselMartini Glass
Ingredients2oz apple schnapps2oz vodka5 ice cubes1oz lime juice

apple schnapps

vodka

lime juice

RECIPE

1. make lime juice

cut then add w/e

1oz lime juice


2. dry shake for 10 seconds

2oz vodka


3. add ice

5 ice cubes


4. shake for 15 seconds


5. double strain on glass
